00017 #include "MisrWriteData.h"
00018 #include "MisrError.h"
00019 #include "MisrUtil.h"
00020 #include <string.h>
00021 #include <stdio.h>
00022 
00029 MTKt_status MtkWriteBinFile3D(
00030   const char *filename, 
00031   MTKt_DataBuffer3D buf  )
00032 {
00033   FILE *fp;         /* File pointer */
00034   char infofname[300];      /* Filename plus extension */
00035   char rawfname[300];       /* Filename plus extension */
00036   char *datatype[MTKd_NDATATYPE] = MTKd_DataType;
00037                 /* Datatype description mapping */
00038   int endian = 1;       /* Endian test */
00039   char *endian_ptr = (char *)&endian;
00040 
00041   if (filename == NULL)
00042     return MTK_NULLPTR;
00043 
00044   /* Write binary file */
00045   strcpy(rawfname, filename);
00046   strcat(rawfname, ".raw");
00047   if ((fp = fopen(rawfname, "wb")) == NULL) {
00048     MTK_ERR_MSG_JUMP("Error opening binfile");
00049   }
00050   fwrite(buf.dataptr, buf.datasize, buf.nblock * buf.nline * buf.nsample, fp);
00051   fclose(fp);
00052 
00053 
00054   /* Write info file */
00055   strcpy(infofname, filename);
00056   strcat(infofname, ".info");
00057   if ((fp = fopen(infofname, "wb")) == NULL) {
00058     MTK_ERR_MSG_JUMP("Error opening infofile");
00059   }
00060 
00061   fprintf(fp, "filename = %s\n", rawfname);
00062 
00063   fprintf(fp, "image.header_bytes = 0\n");
00064   fprintf(fp, "image.nblock = %d\n", buf.nblock);
00065   fprintf(fp, "image.nline = %d\n", buf.nline);
00066   fprintf(fp, "image.nsample = %d\n", buf.nsample);
00067   fprintf(fp, "image.nblock * image.nline = %d\n", buf.nblock * buf.nline);
00068   fprintf(fp, "image.datatype = %s\n", datatype[buf.datatype]);
00069   fprintf(fp, "image.datasize = %d\n", buf.datasize);
00070   if (endian_ptr[0] == 1)
00071     fprintf(fp,"image.byteorder = little_endian\n");
00072   else
00073     fprintf(fp,"image.byteorder = big_endian\n");
00074 
00075   fclose(fp);
00076 
00077   return MTK_SUCCESS;
00078 ERROR_HANDLE:
00079   return MTK_FAILURE;
00080 }
